thread.title: Martin Shkreli To Host NYC Listening Party For His Secret Wu-Tang Record | The Daily Dot
thread.title_full: Martin Shkreli To Host NYC Listening Party For His Secret Wu-Tang Record | The Daily Dot

author: Audra Schroeder
title: Martin Shkreli To Host NYC Listening Party For His Secret Wu-Tang Record | The Daily Dot
text:
Screengrab via Martin Shkreli/YouTube BTW 
Undeterred by a handful of dog shit to the face, former pharmaceutical CEO Martin Shkreli has found his next publicity stunt: playing the sole copy of the Wu-Tang Clan album he reportedly owns . 
According to a post on his Facebook page, Shkreli will be appearing at an event at Webster Hall in New York City on Feb. 20: Martin will discuss investing, healthcare and politics in a presentation/lecture format for one hour and will take questions. There will be a bar session after the Q&A where Shkreli will be available to chat and take photographs. He WILL play tracks from his unreleased music collection (Wu-Tang and more). 
Shkreli played clips from Once Upon a Time in Shaolin on a livestream the day after the election, but with poor audio quality. In November, Shkreli also threatened to release his own rap album, so it's possible he pulls a bait-and-switch and treats the audience to his music instead. The tickets range from $15-$50. 
As of Wednesday, Webster Hall's calendar does not list the event.
